summary: Completed comprehensive testing of CA-Level Financial Statement Workflow application. All core functionality working correctly with both backend APIs and frontend UI components functioning as expected.
passed_tests: Financial Statements page accessible via sidebar navigation
8-step workflow UI displays correctly (Upload, Trial Balance, P&L, Schedules, Ratios, Notes, Cash Flow, Export)
Company Details form renders with name, financial year, and period end date fields
Manual trial balance entry form with account name, group, debit/credit inputs
Balance check functionality showing Dr/Cr totals
Manual Entry and AI Upload mode selection buttons
Workflow step navigation (P&L Statement and Schedules tabs clickable)
All backend APIs returning 200 status codes with proper data structure
